post:
Zeropid now providing high performance 2003 and 2008 windows virtual private servers (vps) at very affordable prices. All VPS servers come with remote desktop (RDP) enabled. All VPS servers are hosted on enterprise grade multi-core Hardware with a minimum of 32/16GB RAM with raid-10 protected storage and offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee. Windows VPS servers are available in both our USA & UK DC's.

We Accept All major credit cards via paypal, Payza (alertpay), moneybookers and Liberty Reserve. Users from all countries are accepted. If you have any questions please feel free to submit a sales ticket with our sales department.


FEATURES:

-- 2003 and 2008 Windows OS.
-- 2003 and 2008 with MSSQL 2008.
-- Remote Desktop Enabled (RDP)
-- Free manual reboots.
-- Free OS re-installs.
-- Free OS version changes.
-- Free WebSitePanel Control Panel.
-- Ipv4 and Ipv6 support.
-- One click Upgrades
-- Full Admin Access
-- No Contracts


========================================================

Available Operating Systems

  • Windows 2008 Server w/ MSSQL Express 2008


Full List of available operating systems, control panels, and addons are listed on our website. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.




Q: How long does it take to setup a VPS?
A: On average, less than 6 hours since you ordered your VPS; however we won't take more than 24 hours.

Q: Where are your servers located?
A: UK AND USA.

Q: What type of server are these VPS hosted on?
A: Quad Core Xeon With Minimum 12 - 32GB RAM





Alertpay:
We do accept alertpay as our payment method for unlimited hosting, reseller hosting, vps servers and dedicated server services. Look no further if you are looking for alertpay host.

Liberty Reserve:
We do accept Liberty Reserve as our payment method for unlimited hosting, reseller hosting, linux/windows vps servers and dedicated server services. Look no further if you are looking for Liberty Reserve host.

MoneyBookers:
We do accept MoneyBookers as our payment method for web hosting, reseller hosting, linux/windows vps servers and dedicated server services. Look no further if you are looking for MoneyBookers host.

Paypal:
We do accept paypal as our payment method for unlimited hosting, reseller hosting, vps servers and dedicated server services. Look no further if you are looking for paypal host.


Q: What payment options do you have available?
A: Currently we accept Paypal, Payza (Alertpay), Liberty Reserve and MoneyBookers.
